page.title: 11ENTERTAINMENT IN ONGAR
page.content: {CASTLE PLAYERS The Castle Players were established 17 years ago.It began as a musical company, a small group met to perform the words and music of one of the founder members Ben Hough. They went on to perform straight plays.They try to perform two full length productions a year and have become renowned for their excellence. The Castle Players performed in a pageant for the town's twinning with Cerizay. Each year the members take part in a pantomime and they also do performances at Jubilee Lodge for the disabled. It has a membership of about 40 and ages range from 21 onwards. For many years the Castle Players performed at Ongar Comprehensive, but recently they moved to the Budworth Hall because of better facilities. The present chairman is Ben Hough.
